description: React component for the Animals page, including list display, detail view, CRUD operations, and telemetry timeline integration.

methods.name: loadAnimals
methods.description: Fetches the list of animals from the API and updates the component state.

methods.name: handleSelect
methods.description: Handles selection of an animal to view details and telemetry.

methods.name: handleCreate
methods.description: Creates a new animal entry via the API and refreshes the list.

methods.name: handleUpdate
methods.description: Updates an existing animal's data via the API and refreshes the list.

methods.name: handleDelete
methods.description: Deletes an animal after user confirmation and refreshes the list.
